Richmond.Hardywood Park Craft Brewery:
Hardywood Park Craft Brewery is a brewery founded in 2011 and located in Richmond, Virginia, USA. In 2015, the brewery became the top rated brewery in Virginia by consumer ratings on RateBeer.com. Hardywood operates in two adjacent buildings situated between the Diamond and the Fan districts in Richmond.


== History ==
Hardywood Park Craft Brewery was founded by Eric McKay and Patrick Murtaugh on October, 2011.
